src:
Bowo Sidik Dituntut 7 tahun penjara
06 Nov 2019, 14:28 by Suhanda


Bowo Sidik Dituntut 7 tahun penjara

KBRN Jakarta: Pengadilan  Tipikor Jakarta melaksanakan sidang pembacaan tuntutan  oleh Jaksa Penuntut Umum KPK. Dalam Pembacaan Tuntutannya Jaksa penuntut Umum KPK menyebut Bowo Sidik menerima gratifikasi atau suap sejak tahun 2016 hingga 2019 yang nilai suapnya lebih dari Rp10 milyar. Atas perbuatan tersebut  Jaksa Penuntut Umum KPK menuntut Mantan Wakil Ketua Komisi VI  DPR RI Bowo Sidik Pangarso, dengan tuntutan 7 tahun kurungan penjara"Menjatuhkan pidana terhadap terdakwa berupa pidana penjara selama 7 tahun dikurangi selama terdakwa betada dalam tahanan   dan pidana denda sebesar 300 juta rupiah subsider 6 bulan kurungan," ucap jaksa penuntut umum KPK dalam Persidangan di PN Tipikor Jakarta Rabu (6/11/2019)Selain itu Bowo Sidik juga dituntut membayar uang pengganti sebesar Rp52 juta."Menjatuhkan pidana tambahan terhadap terdakwa Bowo Sidik untuk membayar uang pengganti sejumlah Rp 52.095.965," kata jaksa KPKJaksa penuntut umum KPK juga meminta majelis hakim untuk tetap melakukan penahanan terhadap Bowo sidik.
text:
Bowo Sidik Demands 7 years in prison
Nov 6 2019, 14:28 by Suhanda


Bowo Sidik Demands 7 years in prison

KBRN Jakarta: The Jakarta Corruption Court is holding a hearing to read a claim by the KPK Public Prosecutor. In reading their demands, the KPK's public prosecutor stated that Bowo Sidik received gratuities or bribes from 2016 to 2019 whose bribes amounted to more than Rp10 billion. For this action the KPK Public Prosecutor demanded that the former Deputy Chairman of the House of Representatives Commission VI Bowo Sidik Pangarso, with a 7-year prison sentence "Bring down the criminal offense in the form of imprisonment for 7 years reduced as long as the defendant was in custody and a fine of 300 million rupiah subsider 6 months in prison, "the prosecutor of the KPK said in the trial at the Jakarta Corruption Court Wednesday (6/11/2019) In addition, Bowo Sidik was also charged with paying a replacement fee of Rp52 million." Dropping an additional criminal charge against the accused Bowo Sidik to pay a replacement fee Rp. 52,095,965, "said the KPK prosecutor The KPK's public prosecutor also asked the panel of judges to continue to detain Bowoprint.
